item.title: Torture command
item.dc:creator: @stormcutter stormcutter
item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

I have a command that i want to torture the victim.
if (command.startsWith(“hit”)) {
{
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(4);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

					if (otherPIndex != -1) {
						client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

						p
								.sendMessage("You have been caught in a whirlpool!");
						p.animation(59, absY, absX);
						p.pEmote = 528;
						p.entangle();
						p.entangle();
						p.entangle();
						p.entangle();
						p.updateRequired = true;
						p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
					}
				} catch (Exception e) {
					sendMessage("Use as ::hit PLAYERNAME");
				}

i can only make it entangle the person but when i change p.entangle(); to like teleblock (p.teleblock(); it says error in compiler. How do i make it so it can ice barrage and teleblock etc

Read full topic
